about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: As a passionate and results-driven Full-Stack Developer with experience in web design and development across diverse projects, committed to continuous learning to keep improving my skills.
about.experience: My journey spans over 2 years in web development involving a skill set that spans both front-end and back-end technologies
about.final-subtitle: I’m excited about the endless possibilities that technology offers, and I’m always eager to take on new and exciting projects.
